text: Ware wa kare-ra no tame ni rippō no naka de sadameta. `Seimei ni wa seimei,-me ni wa me, hana ni wa hana, mimi ni wa mimi, ha ni wa ha, subete no shōgai ni mo,(dōyō no) hōfuku o.' Shikashi sono hōfuku o hikaete yurusunaraba, soreha jibun no tsuminotsugunai to naru. Arrā ga kudasa reru mono ni yotte saiban shinai mono wa, fugi o okonau monodearu
